topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
The Everest hacking group claims to have breached Nissan Motor Co., Ltd., allegedly exfiltrating 900 GB of data. The status of the breach is currently pending verification.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3mc5bufy2ui2c

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Users of Curve Finance on the Arbitrum network are reportedly being targeted by a scam involving a malicious oracle. The scam tricks users into depositing funds into a specific factory stable pool which are then withdrawn by the attackers.
Sources:
- https://t.me/curvefi

entities: Secretaría Distrital de Salud de Bogotá
topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
A threat actor claimed responsibility for an SQL database leak targeting the Secretaría Distrital de Salud de Bogotá (saludcapital.gov.co). The breach allegedly exposed over 90,000 records from emergency health system users due to outdated systems.
Sources:
- https://bsky.app/profile/falconfeedsio.bsky.social/post/3mc4uc5fvrk26
- https://bsky.app/profile/falconfeedsio.bsky.social/post/3mc4ueg3sic26

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
An IDHS data breach has reportedly impacted 700,000 individuals. This incident was noted alongside reports of thousands of ransomware attacks and Chinese hacking of US government emails.
Sources:
- https://twitter.com/41258937/status/2010199739514646769

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
Instagram reportedly suffered a data breach exposing the sensitive information of approximately 17.5 million users, including emails, phone numbers, and physical addresses. The data is allegedly being sold on the dark web.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/28701913/According-to-Engadget-citing-Malwarebytes-Instagram-reportedly-suffered-a-data-breach-exposing-sensitive-information-of-175M-users-including-usernames-emails-phone-numbers-and-physical-addresses-The-data-is-allegedly-being-sold-on-the-dark-web-and-could-en

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary:
BreachForums hacking forum database was leaked, exposing approximately 324,000 user accounts. The leak reportedly includes usernames and emails.
Sources:
- https://www.bleepingcomputer.com
- https://www.reddit.com/r/cybersecurity/comments/1q9ju7r/breachforums_hacking_forum_exposes_324000_user
- https://bsky.app/profile/ransomwaresommelier.com/post/3mc5pyifd5224
